taskDescription: 3-Methyl-2-butanol has five signals in its 13C NMR spectrum at 17.90, 18.15, 20.00, 35.05, and 72.75 δ. Why are the two methyl groups attached to C3 nonequivalent? Making a molecular model should be helpful.
